EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_GET Partner Newsletter_2018.partner webinar invite
EmailTemplate.subject: PRPP Town Hall - A Pivotal Partner Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Please join us for the PRPP Partner Townhall. Pivotal's Global Alliance leadership will present partnership priorities and updates to ensure our joint success in 2018!
This closed-doors webinar will be an opportunity to get insights about the PRPP Partner program directly from the program leads, Melissa Larson and Danny Zaidifard.
We’ll be covering the state of the program and updates coming this year, as well as talking about future plans and objectives for PRPP. If you’d like to learn more about Pivotal’s business objectives in 2018, the latest enablement tools, or how to partner for success, then this is the place for you.
Presented by:
- Danny Zaidifard, Sr. Director Global Alliances
- Melissa Larson, Director Global Alliances
Date: Wednesday, June 27th Time: 12PM PST
Thanks, The Pivotal Global Ecosystem Team Register here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/webinars-events.aspx]]>
